GSD.product_version: versions from v4.3 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
spmi: trace: fix stack-out-of-bound access in SPMI tracing functions

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 1e0ca3d809c36ad3d1f542917718fc22ec6316e7, it was introduced in version v4.3 by commit a9fce374815d8ab94a3e6259802a944e2cc21408. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: spmi: trace: fix stack-out-of-bound access in SPMI tracing functions
